#### Project Information
Tendered by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) for the Metal Storage Pallet Warehouse Racking project.

tenderDescription: 
Due to the previous tender deadline modifications, the new deadline remains unchanged for February 5th, 2024 at 2:00 PM EST. Please submit all required documents and bids electronically. Remember that bids submitted later than the aforementioned deadline will be considered non-responsive. 

### Amendment and Previous Tender Cancellation
This solicitation cancels and supersedes previous solicitations:
- DOC4341872732, dated December 6th, 2023, with a closing on December 28th, 2024 at 2:00 PM EST.
- DOC4378074700,  dated January 2nd, 2024, with a closing on January 17th, 2024 at 2:00 PM EST. A debriefing session will be offered to bidders who have previously submitted proposals for these previous solicitations.
